properties.notes: UNC's home football stadium - student athlete centre and football centre both attached. Key campus landmark.
Location of senior bell tower climb - a tradition for graduating seniors. 52m tall, it was completed in 1931.
36-foot sundial beside the planetarium - one of the largest sundials in the world.
Home of many education programs and school clubs for local schools. Established in 1949. One of the biggest in the USA.
Built in 1897 as UNC's only water source. Now serves as a water fountain, used most on FDOC by students hoping for a 4.0
